did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle: University of Virginia Inter-Fraternity Council Papers, 1958-2003

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions may apply to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: University of Virginia Inter-Fraternity Council Papers, 1958-2003, #RG-23/4/18.081, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These records were transferred from the Inter-Fraternity Council at the University of Virginia to Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, on February 21, 2008.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of the records of the Inter-Fraternity Council at the University of Virginia, ca. 1958-2003, ca. 2,845 items, (14 Hollinger boxes, ca. 6 linear feet). The papers contain reports, case reports, correspondence, photographs, news clippings, manuals, fraternal organization agreements (FOA), by-laws, minutes, agendas, topical files, speeches, and talks.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: These papers are arranged in five series: Series I: Inter-Fraternity Council News Clippings (Box 1); Series II: Inter-Fraternity Council Judiciary Committee (IFCJC) (Boxes 1-4); Series III: Fraternal Organization Agreement (FOA) and Rush (Boxes 5-7); Series IV: Governing Board and Presidents' Council (Box 8); and Series V: Inter-Fraternity Council Miscellaneous Files (Boxes 9-14).
